content:
# The Stone Furnace now shows that it has produced a total of 11 Copper Plates but is currently reporting "NO_FUEL" and warnings indicating that it is "out of fuel" and has "no ingredients to smelt." 

# The furnace has only 2 units of Copper Ore left, which means it cannot continue processing without additional fuel or ingredients. 

# To resolve this, I will need to refuel the furnace again. Since I have 8 units of coal in the furnace, I will insert some more coal from my inventory to ensure it has enough fuel to continue smelting.

# Let's insert 2 units of coal into the Stone Furnace to keep it operational.
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, target=stone_furnace_entity, quantity=2)  # Inserting 2 units of coal into the furnace.

# After refueling, I will check the inventory of both my character and the furnace to confirm the changes.
print(f"Inventory after refueling: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check my inventory after insertion.
furnace_inventory = inspect_inventory(stone_furnace_entity)  # Inspect the furnace inventory.
print(f"Stone Furnace Inventory after refueling: {furnace_inventory}")  # Display the contents of the Stone Furnace after insertion.
